int nsamples

Detailed Description

MIN MAX DISTANCE RANDOM DESIGN

This returns a random subsample from a set of locations in which the maximum distance between any two points is minimised. The minimisation is achieved by taking the "best" subsample (with respect to the max distance between points) out of NSAMPLE similar random subsamples.

ivec MinMaxDesign::subsample ( mat  X,
int  n 
) [virtual]

Returns a random subsample of X of size n which has minimum (amongst a set of NSAMPLES similar subsamples) maximum distance between points.
